definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Cognitive linguistics stresses the study of special location nouns.
sentences.chinese: 認知語言學非常重視對空間方位詞的研究。

sentences.english: Nouns of locality are basically symmetrical and neat.
sentences.chinese: 方位詞基本上是對稱和整齊的。

sentences.english: The formation of location words is culture bound.
sentences.chinese: 方位詞的形成受制約於民族文化。

sentences.english: The noun of locality in Chinese is the categorization results of spatial cognition experience of the Han nationality.
sentences.chinese: 漢語空間方位詞是漢民族空間認知經驗範疇化的結果。

sentences.english: In chapter 6, the changing and alternation of orientation words are explained.
sentences.chinese: 第六章描寫了新舊方位詞的演變和交替情況。
